column1: There is much work to be done. The COVID-19 pandemic has shaken our community and our economy to their core. Americans are sick and suffering and have waited too long for relief and real science-based solutions to this crippling public health crisis.
Volunteer opportunity:  @AndyKimNJ is working hard every day to save the lives and livelihoods at risk because of COVID-19. Sign up to help re-elect Andy to Congress. https://t.co/8giMO5f48A
Boston at rush hour last night. This is what looking out for ourselves and our communities looks like. #COVID19 #stayhomechallenge https://t.co/yBTebJPMA7
